bosnian: Kašnjenje na etut do 10 minuta
english: Being late to a study hour within first 10 minutes

bosnian: Kašnjenje na etut preko 10 minuta, ili nedolazak na etut bez dozvole
english: Being late to a study hour for more than 10 minutes, or not attending a study hour without permission

bosnian: Unošenje ili konzumiranje hrane/pića, uznemiravanje drugih učenika tokom etuta, neprimjereno sjedenje, pričanje, spavanje za vrijeme etuta i sl.
english: Bringing or consuming food/drinks, disturbing other students during a study hour, innapropriate sitting, talking, sleeping during a study hour, etc.

bosnian: Korištenje mobilnog telefona, tableta, laptopa, uređaja za slušanje muzike i sl. za vrijeme etuta
english: Using mobile phones, tablets, laptops, music devices, etc. during a study hour

bosnian: Dolazak na etut u prekratkoj odjeći (šorc, potkošulja i sl.)
english: Attending a study hour in overly short clothes (shorts, undershirt etc.)

bosnian: Samovoljno napuštanje etuta prije njegovog kraja
english: Willingly leaving a study hour before it ends

bosnian: Korištenje laptopa bez dozvole za vrijeme etute ili nakon 23:00 h
english: Using laptops without permission during a study hour, or after 23:00 h

bosnian: Paljenje svjetala u sobi ili na hodniku, pravljenje buke, ometanje drugih, te korištenje lampe ili napuštanje sobe bez dozvole u vremenu nakon 23:00 h
english: Turning on room or corridor lights, making noise, disturbing others, using lamps, or leaving room without permission after 23:00 h

bosnian: Uznemiravanje ili vrijeđanje drugih učenika na bilo koji način
english: Disturbing or insulting other students in any particular way

bosnian: Poticanje rasprave vjerskim, nacionalnim, političkim ili drugim osjetljivim temama
english: Encouraging discussion of religion, nation, politics, and other sensitive topics

bosnian: Nespremljen krevet
english: Untidy bed

bosnian: Napuštanje internata i/ili kampusa bez dozvole
english: Leaving the dormitory and/or campus without permission

bosnian: Kašnjenje u internat
english: Arriving late to the dormitory

bosnian: Noćenje ili duži boravak van internata bez dozvole i najave osoblju, ili uz zakašnjelu najavu odsustva osoblju
english: Staying overnight or for a longer period of time in a place other than the dormitory, without permission and notification of the staff, or failing to notify the staff on time

bosnian: Boravak u internatu za vrijeme vikenda ili praznika bez prethodne najave
english: Staying in the dormitory during weekends and holidays without informing the staff beforehand

bosnian: Dovođenje u internat osoba koje inače ne borave u internatu bez dozvole, koju treba uzeti barem dan ranije iz škole
english: Bringing to the dormitory any person that normally does not stay in the dormitory, without permission obtained from the school at least a day ahead

bosnian: Korištenje pokućstva internata (usisivač, kuhalo, posuđe i sl.) bez dozvole
english: Using dormitory houseware (vacuum cleaner, teakettle, dishes, etc.) without permission

bosnian: Ulazak u sobe vaspitača ili ured direktora internata bez dozvole
english: Entering the rooms of dormitory educators or the principal’s office without permission

bosnian: Boravak na spratovima ili u prostorijama internata koji inače nisu predviđeni za boravak učenika bez dozvole
english: Spending time on floors or in rooms that are normally not meant for students without permission

bosnian: Hodanje internatom u obući, toaletnim papučama i sl.
english: Walking around the dormitory in shoes, toilet slippers, etc.

bosnian: Odlaganje obuće van ormarića i ostavljanje otvorenih vrata ormarića
english: Leaving shoes out of the shoe cabinet or leaving the shoe cabinet doors open

bosnian: Korištenje muzičkih instrumenata, zvučnika i preglasno puštanje bilo kakvih zvukova bez dozvole
english: Using musical instruments or speakers, or simply playing any sounds out loud without permission

bosnian: Korištenje tuđih stvari bez dozvole
english: Using or displacing other students’ property without permission

bosnian: Neprimjereno odijevanje (donji veš, bokserice, bez potkošulje i sl.)
english: Inappropriate clothing (underwear, boxers, no undershirt, etc.)

bosnian: Izbacivanje opasnih predmeta, otpadaka i sl. kroz prozor
english: Throwing dangerous objects, garbage, etc. through the window

bosnian: Nanošenje štete pokućstvu i imovini internata
english: Damaging dormitory houseware and property
note_bosnian: Ovo uključuje i novčanu nadoknadu štete, prema procjeni internatskog domara.
note_english: This also involves financial compensation for the damage, according to the evaluation of the dormitory janitor.

bosnian: Namjerno i bezrazložno aktiviranje protupožarnog alarma
english: Activating fire alarm on purpose and without reason

bosnian: Posjedovanje i korištenje neprimjerenih časopisa, DVD-ova i sl. materijala
english: Possession and usage of inappropriate magazines, DVD-s, and similar materials

bosnian: Konzumiranje cigareta u internatu ili dvorištu internata
english: Consuming cigarettes in the dormitory building or dormitory courtyard

bosnian: Tuča
english: Fighting

bosnian: Biti učenik sobe koja ima preniske bodove iz urednosti, prema procjeni vaspitača koji ocjenjuju urednost
english: Being a student in a room with too low cleanness points, according to the regular evaluations of the educators

bosnian: Ismijavanje pravilnika internata i bodovne liste, kao i poticanje drugih učenika na nepoštivanje istih
english: Making fun of dormitory rules and list of points, as well as encouraging other students to do the same

bosnian: Nepoštivanje osoblja internata
english: Being disrespectful to the dormitory staff
note_bosnian: Ovo uključuje i određene motivacione nagrade i poklone.
note_english: Dormitory and school administration, along with the school discipline committee, will decide on sanctions, behavior mark decreases, or eventual expulsion of the student from the dormitory.

bosnian: Unošenje i posjedovanje stranih i štetnih predmeta (cigarete, alkohol, noževi i sl.). Ovo se odnosi i na predmete slične navedenima, poput elektronskih cigareta, bezalkoholnog piva, džepnih nožića, igraćih karata, drugih štetnih igara i sl.
english: Bringing and posessing any foreign and harmful objects (cigarettes, alcohol, knives, etc.). This also applies to objects similar to the aforementioned ones, such as electronic cigarettes, non-alcoholic beer, pocket knives, playing cards, other harmful games, etc.
note_bosnian: Ovo uključuje i određene motivacione nagrade i poklone.
note_english: Dormitory and school administration, along with the school discipline committee, will decide on sanctions, behavior mark decreases, or eventual expulsion of the student from the dormitory.

bosnian: Krađa
english: Stealing
note_bosnian: Ovo uključuje i određene motivacione nagrade i poklone.
note_english: Dormitory and school administration, along with the school discipline committee, will decide on sanctions, behavior mark decreases, or eventual expulsion of the student from the dormitory.

bosnian: Konzumiranje alkohola i/ili drugih opojnih sredstava u internatu ili dvorištu internata
english: Consuming alcohol and/or other opioids in the dormitory or the dormitory courtyard

bosnian: Bilo kakav drugi postupak ili ponašanje za koje vaspitači i uprava procijene da su neprimjereni i štete disciplini, redu i miru u internatu
english: Any other action or behaviour that dormitory educators or administration deem(s) inappropriate and harmful to the discipline, order, and harmony of the dormitory

bosnian: Biti od pomoći upravi ili osoblju internata
english: Being helpful to the dormitory administration or staff

bosnian: Biti primjer drugim učenicima u ponašanju
english: Being a good example to other students

bosnian: Biti učenik jedne od soba koje su nagrađene za urednost
english: Being a student from a room that is awarded for cleanness
note_bosnian: Ovo uključuje i određene motivacione nagrade i poklone.
note_english: This also involves certain motivational rewards and gifts.

bosnian: Biti odabran za najboljeg učenika mjeseca
english: Being selected as the student of the month
note_bosnian: Ovo uključuje i određene motivacione nagrade i poklone.
note_english: This also involves certain motivational rewards and gifts.

bosnian: Učešće u raznim internatskim aktivnostima i ostvarivanje zapaženih rezultata na istima
english: Participating and performing well on various dormitory activities
note_bosnian: Ovo uključuje i određene motivacione nagrade i poklone.
note_english: This also involves certain motivational rewards and gifts.
